author: Mike Noble
content: Anyone been able to reverse type2 diabetes on carnivore? How long did it take?

replies.content: I did but was doing keto. Main thing. It takes as long as it takes. A1c under 7

I was T2D at the beginning stages, no meds, I reversed it in 2 months with the Omad Carnivore Diet and exercise 4 to 5 days a week. Exercise is very important when it comes to t2d because it helps clear glucose from the blood without the need for insulin.

Yes I did 95% carnivore, (i have some avocado, onions and cauliflower here and there) in 3 months a1c down to 5.7 from 9.3, following 3 months 4.3 a1c and taken off Metformin which was the only thing I was taken. 3 years+ now and never seen an a1c abov‚Ä¶ See more
